title: Don't Be a Problem Solver
description: More is accomplished by focusing on outcomes rather than simply vanquishing problems, says organizational and management consultant Robert Fritz.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: More is accomplished by focusing on outcomes rather than simply vanquishing problems, says organizational and management consultant Robert Fritz.
content:encoded: More is accomplished by focusing on outcomes rather than simply vanquishing problems, says organizational and management consultant Robert Fritz.
